solution_line_template: If the number of grey birds is {grey_birds_initial}, there are {grey_birds_initial}+{additional_white_birds} = <<{grey_birds_initial}+{additional_white_birds}={white_birds}>>{white_birds} white birds near the cage.
When half of the grey birds fly away, the number that remains is {half_fraction}*{grey_birds_initial} = <<{half_fraction}*{grey_birds_initial}={remaining_grey_birds}>>{remaining_grey_birds}
The total number of birds is {remaining_grey_birds}+{white_birds} = <<{remaining_grey_birds}+{white_birds}={total_birds_remaining}>>{total_birds_remaining} in and next to the cage.
